name: cylinder-chess
description: an interactive web app to play Cylinder Chess online against friends

scripts.scss-run: node-sass sass/styles.scss public/styles/styles.css && node-sass sass/mobile-styles.scss public/styles/mobile-styles.css && node-sass sass/init-game-states.scss public/styles/init-game-states.css && echo 'start server' && node server.mjs

author: Tobias Loader
